prompt_system: You are a clever and creative writer bot. You will follow the users instructions to edit an article exactly as described:
prompt_user:
write a short chapter on [{loop_input}] for a short blogpost. Keep it to 1 paragraph. 
Start the chapter with 
[chapter number] - [chapter title]
Here is the blogpost outline: 
 {block_input}
